sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import { db, get, ref } from "../fireba/firebase"; import "./framework.css"; import "./master.css"; import "./style1.css"; import "./dashbord.css"; import profile from "./avatar.png"; import welcome from "./welcome.png"; import photo from "./profile-user.png"; import change from "./cigarette.png"; import setting from "./settings.png"; import friend from "./friends.png"; import multipe from "./multiple-users-silhouette.png"; export default function Dashboard() { const userId = currentUser?.uid; const [error, setError] = useState(""); const { currentUser, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [country, setCountry] = useState(""); const [age, setAge] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { // Fetch name const nameSnapshot = await get(ref(db, `users/${userId}/name`)); if (nameSnapshot.exists()) { setName(nameSnapshot.val()); } else { setName("N/A"); } // Fetch country const countrySnapshot = await get(ref(db, `users/${userId}/country`)); if (countrySnapshot.exists()) { setCountry(countrySnapshot.val()); } else { setCountry("N/A"); } // Fetch age const ageSnapshot = await get(ref(db, "users/${userId}/age")); if (ageSnapshot.exists()) { setAge(ageSnapshot.val()); } else { setAge("N/A"); } } catch (err) { console.error("Error fetching data:", err); alert("Error fetching data!"); } }; fetchData(); }, []); async function handleLogout() { setError(""); try { await logout(); navigate("/login"); } catch { setError("Failed to log out"); } } return (
